name: Play de Oboeru Chuugaku Eitango Deruderu 1200
overview: Play de Oboeru Chuugaku Eitango Deruderu 1200 is an educational game in which the players can learn the meaning of some english words in japanese language. The gameplay is about choosing a basketball player and make it compete alone or againts a computer player or a human player in a round of basketball, but in this game the player won't play basketball, in this game the player have to select the proper japanese word for the english one that the game asked, there are 20 words for each basket match. Each time that the player fails the word the turn pass to his opponent so is better not fail to win each match. In each question the player can choose a 3 points answer or a 2 points answer. The player can pass some words (but there is a limit of the times that the player can pass the words). There are different difficulties levels (from easier to hardest one: each of them with a different character as the player opponent), an alone mode to practice learning those japanese words and even a vs mode for 2 human players to compete.
